mapper.select: SELECT ord.id as id ,ord.member_id as memberId ,ord.total_price as totalPrice ,ord.status as status ,ord.created_at as createdAt ,ord.updated_at as updatedAt ,ord.courier as courier ,ord.tracking_number as trackingNumber ,mem.email as email FROM orders ord JOIN member mem ON ord.member_id = mem.id ORDER BY ord.updated_at DESC
